thread.title: A few minutes with ... a son hanging on to his mother

title: A few minutes with ... a son hanging on to his mother
text:
Published By: Detroit Free Press - Yesterday 
Karen Oberg sat in her wheelchair, cheering on her son, John. It's like this every Sunday. They're together every day ï¿½...
